title: Mediterranean Tuna Wrap
summary: Mediterranean Tuna Wrap might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe serves 1 and costs $5.89 per serving. One serving contains 330 calories, 37g of protein, and 12g of fat. Not a lot of people made this recipe, and 1 would say it hit the spot. It is brought to you by recipes.prevention.com. A mixture of grape tomatoes, olives, lavash, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. To use up the dill you could follow this main course with the Raspberry Chocolate Dessert Quesadilla #Choctoberfest as a dessert. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free and pescatarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 89%. This score is awesome. If you like this recipe, you might also like recipes such as Mediterranean Tuna Wrap, Mediterranean Tuna Wrap, and Mediterranean Tuna Wrap.

winePairing.pairingText: Merlot, Pinot Noir, and rosé Wine are great choices for Tuna. Though fish is often paired with white wine, 'meatier' fish like tuna can absolutely go with red wine. A Rosé will also pair nicely, particularly if your tunan is prepared with ingredients better suited to a white wine. The Robert Mondavi Napa Merlot with a 4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 30 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Robert Mondavi Napa Merlot
productMatches.description: The wine's multi-dimensional flavors come from grapes grown in distinctly different terroirs of Napa Valley, including the Carneros, Stags Leap and Oakville districts. Traditional techniques, including native yeasts, extended maceration, aging in French oak barrels and bottling without filtration, enhanced the wine's complexity. This wine is delicious with many entrees and cheeses. One of our favorite food pairings is roast turkey with a wild mushroom and walnut stuffing. Roast leg of lamb, rubbed with fragrant herbs and spices, or grilled pork loin also marry perfectly with the wine's luscious flavors.
